Dagrad
  • Welcome to Dagrad’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to Dagrad’s documentation!

The dagrad Python library is built to provide researchers with an extensible, modular platform for developing and experimenting with continuous score-based structure learning methods, building upon the introduction of the NOTEARS framework for differentiable structure learning.

The source code is available on GitHub.
